creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait (bijin-ga); nude woman standing on a rock, water at R, washing her PR foot with a blue and white cloth; orange leaves, ULC, with fallen leaves on rocks
marks: [昭和五年秋] {Shōwa gonen aki} (Autumn 1930) [深水畫] {Shinsui ga} (picture by Shinsui); LLC penci
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Fragrance of the Hot-spring
